Package it.uniroma1.mdp.model.players

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.uniroma1.mdp.model.players.Player
it.uniroma1.mdp.model.players.HumanPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class HumanPlayer extends Player implements Serializable
Represents a human player in a card game, inheriting from the Player class. Implements Serializable for object serialization.
